title: Poultry leftovers pie
ingredients: ['1 dessertspoon butter', '6 medium mushrooms, sliced', '5cm piece leek, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed or 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 dessertspoon plain flour', '75ml white wine or stock', '75ml milk', '1 pinch dried thyme, or to taste', '1 handful chopped leftover poultry', '1 ready rolled sheet puff pastry']
